name: Alistair
note:
Сompany Name: Digital Boutique (10 y.o) 

Contact Person: Alistair Macneil 

Product: Omni-channel ecommerce business development, Market research, Ecommerce, Marketing, Luxury Brands, UX, Design, UI, Project Management, and Branding 

SM: Uliana

Fresh results:
Digital Boutique interview

Candidates:

Anastasia - told about her main responsibilities. Answered the questions
Alistair is interested in hiring directly a Magento developer with experience at least 5 years.
The person will know and speak fluently English. His budget is up to 1500 EUR per full-time basis.
Also, I explain to him that it takes time to find the right person and the price for the senior developer is much higher than he expects to provide.
As for other specialities, he doesn't have a need for hiring now. We decide to keep in touch via email.

Alona - told about past experience. projects, current tasks. Told about her degree, languages she knows ( English and German) 

Olga - 20 students, translator ( English - Polish), told about past projects and current tasks.

Maria - told about her past experience on projects, current tasks, and education. Confident, answered all the questions.

Girls did tests  - all deal well.

Results - Liked all the girls. Basically need to think and tell the final decision. we will send him an example of the service agreement and Follow Up with them next week. Communication via mail

Country- Location: Edinburgh, Scotland 

Target Audience (English-speaking Europe companies in the Sport industry): 

 Ecommerce companies- Global Market, Small E-shops and Retail companies

Immediate Requirement:  Lead Generation managers 

Additional possible positions: E-commerce managers 

Do they have team leader to manage Employee:  Yes, they do (2-4 managers), the same as LinkedIn account+ 1 additional. 

Next Step:  Interview with a candidates.
Digital Boutique – Interview (Gary Landa and Alistair) 25.11

1.Hanna U.(ID 750) - https://rh-s.com/lead-generation-managers/hanna-u/  
23 y.o. She has Master's degree in Geographic area,she's worked as a teacher,copywriter and in the Bank. Hanna has a diverse work experience. She is building a list of a lead's database now (80-200 per day). The most effective method for a link generation for her is to search in the Google. Alistair asked about the period that she is working for our company. She answered 2 months. In general 10-7 leads per day was interested in our Service from her connections in LinkedIn. She is working with different areas of search. Gary Landa asked her experience in other companies, she has an experience only in our company.

2. Yuliia P.-  https://rh-s.com/lead-generation-managers/yuliia-p/
Lead Generation manager. She is searching for a clients in LinkedIn. Yuliia has worked with a social networks before. She has Bachelor degree in Engineering. Didn’t understand the question whether she has or had other projects.

3.Anna K.(ID 777) - https://rh-s.com/lead-generation-managers/anna-k/
She is a Lead Generation Manager too, She uses a templates for a messages. She is working here for  5 months. She has an experience of working as a sales manager in other companies. Anna sends 100 invitations for a connection per day. She knows javascript, modelling. Now she likes working as a Lead Generator Manager. Gary asked about the most successful areas she’s found the client. And about Javascript. She had a lessons on Javascript and now she is just learning. Also Anna made a test in Google, she is like an average user. (30 words per minute).

Results: Gary said that they need to discuss the next step. Anna was the best candidate. He asked about the trial period. We can just make a one-day trial otherwise change a candidate.
We proposed one more interview with another candidates. These one have a pure English skills.
Girls didn't understand the question about the duration of their work in our company (in fact-1 month, not more). Alistair liked Anna K. too.

Next steps: Interview with another candidates. We’ll sent the CV’s on their mail.

_______________________________
Fresh info
SM: Uliana

Fresh results:
Digital Boutique interview

Candidates:

Anastasia - told about her main responsibilities. Answered the questions

Alona - told about past experience. projects, current tasks. Told about her degree, languages she knows ( English and German) 

Olga - 20 students, translator ( English - Polish), told about past projects and current tasks.

Maria - told about her past experience on projects, current tasks, and education. Confident, answered all the questions.

Girls did tests  - all deal well.

Results - Liked all the girls. Basically need to think and tell the final decision. we will send him an example of the service agreement and Follow Up with them next week. Communication via mail

Fresh results : Our company is currently working with the client.(22.02.2021)

name: Hostflow
note:
Andrew Denysevych  9:11 AM
Hi Jan,

It's great connecting with you!

I represent an outstaffing company Remote Helpers.
We provide our clients all over the world with remote employees. We would like to offer you our candidates for hire who are available to work in the following positions: Developers(Back-End, Front-End, Full-Stack, QA Testers), Lead Generation Managers, Customer Support, Personal Assistants, Social Media Managers, Designers, Media Buyers, PPC, SEO, AdOps, English teachers, etc.

We can set a call to see if we can find a fit for you and of course explain our model if you are interested.

Today
View Andrew’s profileAndrew Denysevych
Andrew Denysevych  9:13 AM
Hi Jan, I hope you are interested in our proposition to hire remote employees. If so, please let me know. I would be grateful for your reply!

Jan Minnier sent the following message at 10:41 AM
View Jan’s profileJan Minnier
Jan Minnier   10:41 AM
Hi Andrew
A virtual chat assistant could possibly be interesting for me. For my vacation rental management agency.

Andrew Denysevych sent the following message at 11:50 AM
View Andrew’s profileAndrew Denysevych
Andrew Denysevych  11:50 AM
Thank you for your reply! Great, let's set up a short 30-min call to discuss more in details. May I know your email and the most suitable time for you?

Jan Minnier sent the following message at 11:59 AM
View Jan’s profileJan Minnier
Jan Minnier   11:59 AM
Please choose a call on Wednesday morning if possible.
https://cal.com/hostflow/jan

Austausch mit Jan | Hostflow | Cal.com
cal.com
Austausch mit Jan
Seen by Jan Minnier at 11:59 AM.
Andrew Denysevych sent the following messages at 12:03 PM
View Andrew’s profileAndrew Denysevych
Andrew Denysevych  12:03 PM
I’ve scheduled a call for 9 AM Kyiv time on Wednesday. 

Quick note: This call will be handled by our head managers who are best equipped to discuss your specific needs and offer personalized insights. They'll be able to guide you through everything in detail.

Wishing you a successful day!????

need_candidates.comment_requirements: availability from 7 am to 11 10 pm Swiiss time

name: Umut Kivrak
note:
RESULT

Company Name: LeadChamps 
Company Website: http://www.leadchamps.co
Contact Person: Umut Kivrak
Product: They've built out hundreds of frameworks, standard operating procedures, email campaigns, landing pages, full marketing funnels, conversion scripts and 'assets'​ so that when they plan our growth engine they can show us how to make it live in blistering time.
Specialties:  Lead Generation, Automation, Sales Automation, Lead Engine, AI, Machine Learning, Growth Hacking, and Marketing Automation
Country-Location: Austria
Target Audience: worldwide
Immediate Requirement: Umut needs a Content writer with high German language. Also he needs a Lead Generator Manager (English language). 
Next Step: send all information about our company, send cv's of possible candidates. 
Next Contact Date: keep in touch by email. Set up a call next week.

SM: Anna V.

FRESH RESULT
We have interviewed Lejla for LeadChamps company.

Leila https://rh-s.com/lejla-g/

They spoke in German language. Umut wanted to understand Leila`s German language skills.
Also after the call we will send Leila`s example of works (articles), Umut will receive it and come back to us with a decision.

name: Nils Tharandt Ortiz
note:
Yes which profiles ?
can I pay in USDT?
I bit later in Q2 with pleasure. Ping me in May, that would be a good time.
Company Name: Paypolitan

Website: http://www.paypolitan.io

Country: Tallinn, Estonia

Contact Person: Nils Tharandt Ortiz

Product: Mobile payments for fiat and cryptocurrencies with yield farming. The Paypolitan platform will use blockchain technology, smart contracts and open banking APIs to provide a next-gen billing solution that meets the needs of modern payment systems for businesses and customers.

Immediate Requirement: Marketing Manager with a good understanding of SMM, crypto, blockchain, TV campaigns and payment management. The client wants to set up an interview with the most experienced candidates we have.

Next Step: Send the presentation, CVs of possible candidates, a sample of SA.

Next Contact Date: Nils wants to go through CVs first. He is going to give his feedback and send the best day and time for the interview next week.
